Who: RODIMUS PRIME, Tuscon, Nightshift, Darkhawk, Perceptor
Location: Black Fortress - Tunnels beneath the Black Fortress

> "I think that I have a lapsus emotional"said drayly from himself"Lucky for
> us the exit to Blackfortress is close, after this next time we meet
> everything will be as usual"

Rodimus Prime hid a small smile as he traveled along with the others,
listening to the banter back and forth. His optic displaying a bit of
mirth as he watched them he nodded to Perceptor.  "You say that our
actions are predictable, and even boring, but in the end people of all
types flourish where there is freedom. What would you gain under the
rule of the Predcons or the Decepticons?"

Rodimus shrugged as he continued, "What will you do if you succeed in
conquering everything?" Rodimus frowned, "One thing I have learned
spending these past months among you is that Predacons, much like the
Decepticons, care only about power even at the expense of each other.
That is why they cannot win, because in the end they only work against
each other."

Rodimus looked speculatively at Perceptor, "Is there anything more
that you would want for yourself?"

Even as they walked the sounds of rumbling could be heard coming from
behind them, the sounds of someone digging could be clearly heard,
like a drill, or several of them moving in their direction through the
very walls.

"That sounds like Scorponok's digging!" Rodimus said, his voice and
face resolute. "We had better hurry, we do not want to be stuck down
here with him."

(TAG)

Meanwhile:

Who: LEGACY, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA, BLACKRAZOR, Rat Trap, Quickstride
Location: Black Fortress - hallway

Legacy, noting the direction that the others have left in started up
his own motors. "Come he said to Rat Trap and Quickstride, "We also
need to leave. No doubt the Predacons and Decepticons are rallying for
some sort of defensive maneuver."

"You would be right." A voice from the shadows ahead said as the bulky
form of Deepstyke could be seen in his gun unit mode.

Even as Deepstryke spoke from behind chuckling could be heard as
Phobia and Nightrazor come out as if from side hall or doorway, they
chuckle as Phobia's voice could be heard chiming in, "Although it is
too late to do anything about it."

As one the three units open fire, Deepstryke's cannons opened up on
Legacy, who's shielding was beginning to fail under the onslaught
while Phobia and Nightrazor aimed for Rat Trap and Quickstride.

(TAG)

OOC: Airly, I am not sure what you want to do with Hydras. If you want
to send me a note offline you can and we can work something out, or
you can post him in action if you like. Cyclonus and Scourge will be
with him, if that's okay with you.

Preston
